page.title: 16AMPFIELD JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Ampfield Junior School is a school next to the church in Ampfield.It has two large classrooms,and two pupils from the age of 4_11 years who receive their{education}at the school. One class goes from the age of 4-7 years and the second from 8-11 years. Most of the children come from Ampfield or Romsey 2 miles away, 1 from Baddesley 4miles away, Hursley 2 miles away,Chilworth 7 miles away and Chandlers Ford 4 miles away.The pupils use various forms of transport to get to school including car,walking and cycling.
